1.0.1.name: wordpress/wd-twitter-feed
1.0.1.description:
Integrate an amazing Twitter Feed Widget to your widget's sidebar! Using Ajax, the data is being loaded "behind the scene" thus allowing the page to load quickly.

Feature List:

  1. Use Ajax to load your tweets on the background without increasing load time
  2. Graphically attractive, easily customizable, various styles are available
  3. Very simple to setup
  4. Specifically designed to work with both "ltr" and "rtl" languages (see screenshots)
  5. Allows data caching to avoid Twitter rate limits

Follow me on twitter to be updated on new versions and releases: @YoavKadosh

Contribute to this widget via GitHub

Visit my website for more information about the plugin (written in hebrew): WebDesk.co.il
